text: My #California friends - do NOT ignore the #CaliforniaRecallElection. #VoteNoOnRecall and get that ballot turned in by September 14th. There's a LOT of outside money trying to influence the stupid in our beautiful state. #CA #VoteNoOnRecallCA #VoteNoOnTheRecall #CARecall #VoteNo https://t.co/X3t2hAJxGV
